00045 /// Opaque cpConstraint struct.
00046 struct cpConstraint {
00047         CP_PRIVATE(const cpConstraintClass *klass);
00048         
00049         /// The first body connected to this constraint.
00050         cpBody *a;
00051         /// The second body connected to this constraint.
00052         cpBody *b;
00053         
00054         CP_PRIVATE(cpSpace *space);
00055         
00056         CP_PRIVATE(cpConstraint *next_a);
00057         CP_PRIVATE(cpConstraint *next_b);
00058         
00059         /// The maximum force that this constraint is allowed to use.
00060         /// Defaults to infinity.
00061         cpFloat maxForce;
00062         /// The rate at which joint error is corrected.
00063         /// Defaults to pow(1.0 - 0.1, 60.0) meaning that it will
00064         /// correct 10% of the error every 1/60th of a second.
00065         cpFloat errorBias;
00066         /// The maximum rate at which joint error is corrected.
00067         /// Defaults to infinity.
00068         cpFloat maxBias;
00069         
00070         /// Function called before the solver runs.
00071         /// Animate your joint anchors, update your motor torque, etc.
00072         cpConstraintPreSolveFunc preSolve;
00073         
00074         /// Function called after the solver runs.
00075         /// Use the applied impulse to perform effects like breakable joints.
00076         cpConstraintPostSolveFunc postSolve;
00077         
00078         /// User definable data pointer.
00079         /// Generally this points to your the game object class so you can access it
00080         /// when given a cpConstraint reference in a callback.
00081         cpDataPointer data;
00082 };
00083 
00084 /// Destroy a constraint.
00085 void cpConstraintDestroy(cpConstraint *constraint);
00086 /// Destroy and free a constraint.
00087 void cpConstraintFree(cpConstraint *constraint);

00089 /// @private
00090 static inline void cpConstraintActivateBodies(cpConstraint *constraint)
00091 {
00092         cpBody *a = constraint->a; if(a) cpBodyActivate(a);
00093         cpBody *b = constraint->b; if(b) cpBodyActivate(b);
00094 }

00118 /// Get the last impulse applied by this constraint.
00119 static inline cpFloat cpConstraintGetImpulse(cpConstraint *constraint)
00120 {
00121         return constraint->CP_PRIVATE(klass)->getImpulse(constraint);
00122 }

00127         cpAssertHard(constraint->CP_PRIVATE(klass) == struct##GetClass(), "Constraint is not a "#struct)
